item.title: Nippon Ichi Software president Tetsuhisa Seko dies at age 54
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/nippon-ichi-software-president-tetsuhisa-seko-dies-at-age-54

A funeral will be held on January 29.

Nippon Ichi Software president Tetsuhisa Seko has passed away at the age of 54, the company announced.

Seko joined Nippon Ichi Software in March 2002 after working at SNK and Toshin, and after moving through various management positions, was appointed president and representative director of Nippon Ichi Software in July 2023.

According to Jiji, Seko passed away in the hospital. A funeral will be held at Memoire Kakamigahara on January 29 at 11:00 JST.

item.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II ‘Story’ and ‘Battle’ demos now available for PS5, PS4 in the west
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/the-legend-of-heroes-trails-through-daybreak-ii-story-and-battle-demos-now-available-for-ps5-ps4-in-the-west

  • PS4
  • PS5

Save data from the "Story" demo can be carried over to the full game.

“Story” and “Battle” demos for The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II are now available for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 via PlayStation Store in the west, publisher NIS America announced.

Here is an overview of the each demo:

  • Battle Demo – Select from one of two parties and take on the Märchen Garten in the free The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II Battle Demo.
  • Story Demo – Experience the beginning of The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II in the free Story Demo. (PlayStation 4 demo save data can be transferred to the full PlayStation 4 or PlayStation 5 game upon its release. PlayStation 5 demo save data can be transferred to the full PlayStation 5 game upon its release.)

The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on February 14 in the west.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation Demo Trailer
